sentences: Ta tegi sama vea kolmandat korda järjest.
context: The word 'kord' in Estonian is a versatile noun that primarily means 'time', 'occasion', or 'instance'. It can also refer to 'round' as in repetition. When used with numbers (esmakord - first time, teinekord - second time) it indicates ordinal occurrences. In expressions like 'kolm korda' three times), it functions as a counter for repetitions.
